document_title: Testicular prolapse: Causes, symptoms and treatment
subsection_name: sa-tinh-hoan.json_8_How to prevent scrotal prolapse in men?
subsection_content:
Testicular prolapse is a natural part of the aging process. We have no way to completely prevent it. Even if cosmetic surgery is chosen, the scrotal skin will eventually begin to sag.(3)
However, men can slow down the aging process in this part by:
Exercise regularly, about 30 minutes a day.; No smoking; Limiting alcohol intake.; Add plenty of vitamins A, B, C and E along with sorbitol and omega 3 fatty acids in your diet.; Drink plenty of water: Drink about 2 - 2.5 liters of water/day, depending on activity level.
